ModMetaData.name: Escape the Rimworld - Wastelander Branch - Combat Extended Edition
ModMetaData.author: zhrocks11 Artwork By; Skytheman32
ModMetaData.description: The Combat Extended Version of the Escape the Rimworld - Wastelander Branch, This mod addes wasteland editions to the vanilla weapons which are worn down and made out of less durable materials, Much cheaper and quicker to craft but at the expense of being less comabat effective
